TEXT.English: A special event just happened in Europe.[NEWLINE]Scholars argue that the interpretation of biblical texts, advocated by the Catholic Church is wrong.[NEWLINE]Considered heretics by the Pope, these men triggered a Protestant Reformation, which aims to return to the sources of Christianity.[NEWLINE]This important fact will cause some of the tensions in our country.
TEXT.French: Un évènement exceptionnel vient de se produire en Europe.[NEWLINE]Les érudits affirment que l'interprétation des textes bibliques, pronée par l'Eglise Catholique, est erronée.[NEWLINE]Considérés comme hérétiques par le Pape, ces hommes ont ammorcé une Réforme Protestante qui vise à revenir aux sources du Christianisme.[NEWLINE]Ce fait important provoquera certainement des tensions dans notre Patrie.
TEXT.German: A special event just happened in Europe.[NEWLINE]Scholars argue that the interpretation of biblical texts, advocated by the Catholic Church is wrong.[NEWLINE]Considered heretics by the Pope, these men triggered a Protestant Reformation, which aims to return to the sources of Christianity.[NEWLINE]This important fact will cause some of the tensions in our country.
TEXT.Italian: A special event just happened in Europe.[NEWLINE]Scholars argue that the interpretation of biblical texts, advocated by the Catholic Church is wrong.[NEWLINE]Considered heretics by the Pope, these men triggered a Protestant Reformation, which aims to return to the sources of Christianity.[NEWLINE]This important fact will cause some of the tensions in our country.
TEXT.Spanish: A special event just happened in Europe.[NEWLINE]Scholars argue that the interpretation of biblical texts, advocated by the Catholic Church is wrong.[NEWLINE]Considered heretics by the Pope, these men triggered a Protestant Reformation, which aims to return to the sources of Christianity.[NEWLINE]This important fact will cause some of the tensions in our country.

TEXT.English: Great news![NEWLINE]An inspired man has discovered a process of distillation of molasses. This sugar residue will allow us, after distillation, to produce [BOLD]rum[\BOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can now build distilleries in your colonies.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Grande nouvelle![NEWLINE]Un homme inspiré vient de découvrir un procédé de distillation de la melasse. Ce résidu de sucre nous permettra, après distillation, de produire du [BOLD]rhum[\BOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vous pouvez désormais construire des distilleries dans vos colonies.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Great news![NEWLINE]An inspired man has discovered a process of distillation of molasses. This sugar residue will allow us, after distillation, to produce [BOLD]rum[\BOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can now build distilleries in your colonies.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: Great news![NEWLINE]An inspired man has discovered a process of distillation of molasses. This sugar residue will allow us, after distillation, to produce [BOLD]rum[\BOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can now build distilleries in your colonies.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Great news![NEWLINE]An inspired man has discovered a process of distillation of molasses. This sugar residue will allow us, after distillation, to produce [BOLD]rum[\BOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can now build distilleries in your colonies.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Your record is excellent. You have exchanged more than [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1 ressources[COLOR_REVERT] resources in Europe.[NEWLINE]As the land you occupy presage considerable profit, King would like you were trying to adapt a seedling whose cultivation, except wheat, is impossible in Europe.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Select the seedling you want, ensuring that the type of soil is suitable:
